text:
Shashi Tharoor Gushing Over SRK's Shrine In His Munnar Hotel Room Is The Story Of Every Fanboy!
Shashi Tharoor Gushing Over SRK's Shrine In His Munnar Hotel Room Is The Story Of Every Fanboy!
Shah Rukh Khan has an enviable fan base all over the world and fans go to any and every extent to catch a glimpse of their favorite superstar or just to touch him once. Not many know that Shah Rukh Khan has a shrine dedicated to him in Munnar, Kerala.
Agencies
And it took someone like Shashi Tharoor to notice just that. Tharoor was recently in Munnar where he stayed in the same room in which SRK also stayed when he was shooting for his film Chennai Express.
Twitter
Tharoor took to his social media accounts to share this news and friends have gone berserk since then. He tweeted,
Dear @iamsrk, when on a brief visit to Munnar yesterday I took rest in the room you occupied in 2013, which has been converted into a shrine for you & #ChennaiExpress! Every wall is decorated w/posters of the film &the suite is dominated by this cut-out of you. No place for rest! pic.twitter.com/hFUYCgXLEc — Shashi Tharoor (@ShashiTharoor) January 21, 2019
Don't Miss 343 SHARES 555 SHARES 263 SHARES 449 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES
As per Shashi Tharoor's tweet, the hotel room was converted into a shrine for the actor and the wall was decorated with the posters of Chennai Express.
title: Shashi Tharoor Gushing Over SRK's Shrine In His Munnar Hotel Room Is The Story Of Every Fanboy!
description: Shah Rukh Khan has an enviable fan base all over the world and fans go to any and every extent to catch a glimpse of their favorite superstar or just to touch him once. Not many know that Shah Rukh Khan has a shrine dedicated to him in Munnar, Kerala?
